reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and clear explanations. Challenging but fair exams.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Excellent teacher! Makes complex concepts easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Interesting content, but sometimes disorganized in class.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Assignments can be time-consuming.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Brilliant researcher and inspiring teacher. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Difficult to follow in class. Office hours are helpful though.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Insightful discussions and thought-provoking assignments.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but can be intimidating. Grading is tough.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Amazing lab instructor. Patient and always willing to help.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Challenges students to think critically. Fascinating debates in class.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Good lecturer but strict with deadlines. Be prepared to work hard.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate and knowledgeable. Field trips are a highlight.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Balanced viewpoints and encourages healthy debates.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Outdated teaching methods. Content needs to be more current.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Engaging and fun classes. Makes a difficult subject enjoyable.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Good real-world examples, but lectures can be dry at times.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Fascinating course content. Heavy workload but worth it.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Exceptional teacher. Patient and great at explaining complex concepts.

reviews.subject: Geology
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but sometimes goes off-topic. Field work is excellent.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Clear explanations and helpful practice problems. Fair grader.
